Message.Title: ebay resolution
Message.Msg: is as useful as #$%$ on boar.you tell them the seller,whom they have de-registered,won't respond to your e-mails.their answer is to e-mail them again.what idiots!if they answered to begin with you wouldn't be at the resolution page.I am just going to go to my credit card company and get my money back.let Paypal/Ebay fight with Mastercard.they will lose.needless to say I am done with Ebay cheers

Message.Title: WHITES 1294 IS THE SHILL
Message.Msg: every company,well most of the bigger ones has someone on the message boards to combat critics.this is their guy.

Message.Title: Knowing that DRIBBLES is unemployed and homeless....
Message.Msg: I wonder if this boards resident Village Idiot, will be eating Thanksgiving dinner at his local soup kitchen. ROTFLMAO!!! Sully

Topic.Title: Hey Mad,I heard You and Temple U had a very happy group of kids there !!!

Message.Msg: Cincy, what is the good news at Temple regarding Mad?

Topic.Title: Hey Mad,I heard You and Temple U had a very happy group of kids there !!!

Message.Msg: It wasn't Madbezo specific,It was 20 people up for a $20.000 scholarship @ Temple U.Just 1 could win,it turned out that everyone of them were rewarded the top prize.And will go onward and upward at the U.I watched on nation news,it was cool night.They all were floored!!! GLTY
